title: E-Learning Practices and Instructional Design Strategies: Enhancing Practitioner Competencies for Mathematical Workplace Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Analysis of e-learning implementation status and development of customized instructional design strategies for strengthening math job competencies among in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more learner-tailored math content design strategies in e-learning environments
Learners can complete one or more collaborative math problem-solving projects using Web 2.0 tools
Learners can develop two or more types of math education assessment tools applicable in mobile learning environments

resources: Digital collaboration tools (Padlet, Google Workspace, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
